content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• Intended Lab Structure at (0.5, 2.5)
  – Use-case: Supply Automation Science Packs to advance research.
  – Note: Multiple placement attempts were made, but no Lab was successfully built due to inventory and resource shortages.
• Production Facilities in Use (Pre‐existing)
  – Iron Smelting Facility at (5.0, 5.0)
     • Used to process iron ore into iron plates.
  – Copper Smelting Facility at (–27.0, –60.0)
     • Used to convert harvested copper ore into copper plates.
  – Note: These furnaces were retrieved from the map for smelting operations; they were not newly constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API Usage for Entity Retrieval
  – When invoking get_entities, avoid unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and extra positional arguments. Verify the correct function signature against the API documentation.
• Iterating Over a None Value
  – Always check that the value returned from an entity retrieval call is not None before iterating. Use an empty list as a safe fallback.
• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures
  – Confirm that the Lab item is present in inventory before attempting to place it.
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are available or can be produced beforehand.
  – Prioritize stable production (such as sufficient smelting of iron and copper plates) to meet the crafting demands of a Lab.
